public void noEnlargment()

bigEnlargment

public void bigEnlargment()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
The test data don't fit into the increment so a the file must be enlarged. After writing a bunch of test data that are greater in size that the increment size another huge bunch will be written. This simulates a problem that we have encountered when the enlargement is not done correctly.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                 throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
